definitions.definition: The complex, spirally coiled , tapered cavity of the inner ear of higher vertebrates , which contains the organ of Corti and in which sound vibrations are converted into nerve impulses .
A spiral -shaped shell, especially that of a snail .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) The complex, spirally coiled , tapered cavity of the inner ear of higher vertebrates , which contains the organ of Corti and in which sound vibrations are converted into nerve impulses .
secondary_definitions: A spiral -shaped shell, especially that of a snail .
